class auth_app.api.serializers.BusinessProfileDetailSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for the BusinessProfile model. Provides details such as the user, creation timestamp, uploaded file, business location, telephone number, description, working hours, and type.

class Meta

Bases: object

fields = ['user', 'created_at', 'file', 'uploaded_at', 'location', 'tel', 'description', 'working_hours', 'type']
model

alias of BusinessProfile

class auth_app.api.serializers.BusinessProfileSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for the BusinessProfile model. Customizes the representation of user details and other business-related fields.

class Meta

Bases: object

alias of BusinessProfile

to_representation(instance)

Customizes the representation of the BusinessProfile model by adding user details for GET requests, and includes user primary key.

class auth_app.api.serializers.LoginSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Serializer

Serializer for user login. Validates the username and password for authentication.

create(validated_data)

Returns the authenticated user after successful login.

validate(attrs)

Validates that the username exists and the password is correct.

class auth_app.api.serializers.RegistrationSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Serializer

Serializer for user registration. Handles validation of the provided username, email, and password, as well as the account type (customer/business).

create(validated_data)

Creates a new user account using the validated data, including setting the password and saving the account.

validate(attrs)

Validates the registration data, ensuring that: - The username is unique - The passwords match - The account type is valid (either ‘customer’ or ‘business’)

class auth_app.api.serializers.UserSerializer(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for User model. Provides basic user details such as username, email, first name, and last name.

class Meta

Bases: object

fields = ['username', 'email', 'first_name', 'last_name']
model

alias of User

class auth_app.api.views.LoginView(**kwargs)

Bases: APIView

Handles user login and token generation by verifying credentials. Inherits from APIView to handle POST requests for login.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny'>]
post(request)

Authenticates the user and returns an authentication token if successful.

class auth_app.api.views.ProfileDetailView(**kwargs)

Bases: APIView

authentication_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.authentication.TokenAuthentication'>]
get(request, pk)

Fetches user profile details, including the user’s information and profile data.

patch(request, pk)

Allows updating of the user profile details if the user is the profile owner or an admin.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.IsAuthenticated'>]
class auth_app.api.views.RegistrationView(**kwargs)

Bases: APIView

Handles user registration and token generation. Inherits from APIView to handle POST requests for registration.

permission_classes = [<class 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny'>]
post(request)

Registers a new user, sets their password, and creates an authentication token. The user profile is created based on the ‘type’ (either ‘customer’ or ‘business’).
